title: Kamala Harris, Trailblazer Eying America's Last Glass Ceiling
content: For years Kamala Harris faced criticism that she was not up to the job of being a heartbeat away from the presidency. Now, she finds herself feted by Democrats as their best hope to stop Donald Trump's comeback.
summary: For years Kamala Harris faced criticism that she was not up to the job of being a heartbeat away from the presidency. Now, she finds herself feted by Democrats as their best hope to stop Donald Trump's comeback.

title: The Biden Bombshell: A Plot Twist That Roils Trump Too
content: Joe Biden's withdrawal upends what was already a White House race for the ages, but it will rattle Donald Trump, too -- forcing him to recalibrate a campaign that was focused almost entirely on his former opponent.
summary: Joe Biden's withdrawal upends what was already a White House race for the ages, but it will rattle Donald Trump, too -- forcing him to recalibrate a campaign that was focused almost entirely on his former opponent.

title: Pendulum Swung To Republican Party: Elon Musk's Jab After Biden Announcement
content: Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, has tweeted his disapproval of US President Biden's move to end his reelection campaign.
summary: Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, has tweeted his disapproval of US President Biden's move to end his reelection campaign.

title: Jill Biden's 'Heart' Response To Husband's Move To Quit Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden has announced that he is stepping out of the pesidential race slated for later this year. To this announcement, Joe Biden's wife Jill Biden had a no-word response, just a heart emoji.
summary: US President Joe Biden has announced that he is stepping out of the pesidential race slated for later this year. To this announcement, Joe Biden's wife Jill Biden had a no-word response, just a heart emoji.

title: Explained: Joe Biden Won't Run For Re-Election. What Happens Next?
content: US President Joe Biden announced on Sunday that he was withdrawing from the presidential race against challenger Donald Trump, following a dismal debate performance and flagging polling numbers.
summary: US President Joe Biden announced on Sunday that he was withdrawing from the presidential race against challenger Donald Trump, following a dismal debate performance and flagging polling numbers.

title: Biden Abruptly Changed His Mind About 2024 Race Over Weekend: Report
content: President Joe Biden as of Saturday night had planned to stay in the 2024 presidential race, but told senior staff on Sunday afternoon that he was withdrawing, a source familiar with the matter said.
summary: President Joe Biden as of Saturday night had planned to stay in the 2024 presidential race, but told senior staff on Sunday afternoon that he was withdrawing, a source familiar with the matter said.

title: Trump Says Kamala Harris Will Be Easier To Defeat, After Joe Biden Quits
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump told CNN on Sunday that he thinks Vice President Kamala Harris will be easier to defeat in November's election than Democratic President Joe Biden who stepped aside as his party's candidate.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump told CNN on Sunday that he thinks Vice President Kamala Harris will be easier to defeat in November's election than Democratic President Joe Biden who stepped aside as his party's candidate.

title: Joe Biden Endorses Kamala Harris As Democratic Party's Presidential Nominee
content: Joe Biden endorses Kamala Harris as Democratic Party's presidential nominee
summary: Joe Biden endorses Kamala Harris as Democratic Party's presidential nominee

title: The Final Days: How Biden And His Inner Circle Blew It
content: Joe Biden's decision to end his reelection campaign on Sunday followed a series of strategic missteps by his campaign team and White House aides that amplified concerns that the 81-year-old president wouldn't be able to win in November's election.
summary: Joe Biden's decision to end his reelection campaign on Sunday followed a series of strategic missteps by his campaign team and White House aides that amplified concerns that the 81-year-old president wouldn't be able to win in November's election.

title: Joe Biden Won't Contest US Presidential Polls: Full Text Of Announcement
content: US President Joe Biden ended his re-election campaign on Sunday after fellow Democrats lost faith in his mental acuity and ability to beat Donald Trump, leaving the presidential race in uncharted territory.
summary: US President Joe Biden ended his re-election campaign on Sunday after fellow Democrats lost faith in his mental acuity and ability to beat Donald Trump, leaving the presidential race in uncharted territory.

title: "In Best Interest...": Biden Bows Out Of US Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden announced Sunday that he was dropping out of his reelection battle with Donald Trump, in a historic move that plunges the already turbulent 2024 White House race into uncharted territory.
summary: US President Joe Biden announced Sunday that he was dropping out of his reelection battle with Donald Trump, in a historic move that plunges the already turbulent 2024 White House race into uncharted territory.

title: "Why Did My Father Have To Die": Relatives Mourn Bangladesh Unrest Victims
content: Grief-stricken widow Fatema Begum wept when hospital staff said her husband had been killed in the unrest that has roiled Bangladesh for nearly a week. She wept again when they refused to hand over his body.
summary: Grief-stricken widow Fatema Begum wept when hospital staff said her husband had been killed in the unrest that has roiled Bangladesh for nearly a week. She wept again when they refused to hand over his body.

title: Israelis "Not Welcome At Paris Olympic Games", Says French MP, Sparks Row
content: A major French Jewish group on Sunday slammed a hard-left MP for saying Israeli athletes were not welcome at the Paris Olympics from next week because of the war in Gaza, calling the comments "irresponsible".
summary: A major French Jewish group on Sunday slammed a hard-left MP for saying Israeli athletes were not welcome at the Paris Olympics from next week because of the war in Gaza, calling the comments "irresponsible".

title: Explained: Why Bangladesh Students Are Protesting Against Job Quotas
content: Bangladesh's Supreme Court on Sunday scrapped most of the quotas on government jobs that had sparked nationwide protests by students that have killed at least 139 people in recent days.
summary: Bangladesh's Supreme Court on Sunday scrapped most of the quotas on government jobs that had sparked nationwide protests by students that have killed at least 139 people in recent days.

title: Caged Like "Terrorist" In Jail, Being Denied Basic Human Rights: Imran Khan
content: Pakistan's jailed former premier Imran Khan has claimed that he is being caged like a "terrorist", and was denied basic prisoner and human rights in a "death cell" at a high-security jail.
summary: Pakistan's jailed former premier Imran Khan has claimed that he is being caged like a "terrorist", and was denied basic prisoner and human rights in a "death cell" at a high-security jail.

title: Israel Shoots Down Missile Fired From Yemen After Striking Houthis
content: Israel said it shot down a missile launched from Yemen on Sunday and the Yemeni Houthi movement said it had fired several missiles at the Israeli city of Eilat after Israel's first public strike against the Iran-aligned group a day earlier.
summary: Israel said it shot down a missile launched from Yemen on Sunday and the Yemeni Houthi movement said it had fired several missiles at the Israeli city of Eilat after Israel's first public strike against the Iran-aligned group a day earlier.

title: India Has Historic Relationship With Russia, Not Going To Cut It Off: US
content: There is no tangible evidence of India deepening its military and technology relationship with Russia, US National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan has said, asserting that Moscow has become a "junior partner" to China.
summary: There is no tangible evidence of India deepening its military and technology relationship with Russia, US National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan has said, asserting that Moscow has become a "junior partner" to China.

title: Hezbollah Fires Rockets At Israel After Strike On Lebanon
content: Lebanon's Hezbollah on Sunday said it fired Katyusha rockets at northern Israel in response to an overnight Israeli strike that, according to state media, hit a weapons depot and wounded six people.
summary: Lebanon's Hezbollah on Sunday said it fired Katyusha rockets at northern Israel in response to an overnight Israeli strike that, according to state media, hit a weapons depot and wounded six people.

title: Houthis Pledge "Huge" Response to Israel Strike As Gaza Violence Spreads
content: Yemen's Houthi rebels promised a "huge" retaliation against Israel on Sunday following a deadly strike on the port of Hodeida, as violence sparked by the Gaza war gripped the region.
summary: Yemen's Houthi rebels promised a "huge" retaliation against Israel on Sunday following a deadly strike on the port of Hodeida, as violence sparked by the Gaza war gripped the region.
